All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
 
ApplicationApprovalControllerCompanyRep
Company rep only class for handling application approvals and rejections apllied by students
ApplicationController
Manages internship applications and registry for internship applications.
ApplicationRegistry
Manages application persistence and retrieval for applicaitons handles application submissions, lookups, and persistence
ApplicationReportController
Provides application-centric reporting utilities.
ApplicationReportingService
Interface class defines views for applications by internship, student, or status.
ApplicationValidator
ApplicationValidator class contains methods to validate application eligibility and acceptance.
AuthController
This controller handles user registry plus authentication flows It handles loads/saves users, logs in/out, password changes, company rep registration/approval
AuthService
Class defines authentication methoeds for the CLI - login/logout session handling - change password for the currently logged-in user
CareerCenterStaff
 
CLI
class handles the CLI interface for the internship placement management system.
Company
 
CompanyApplicationApprovalService
CompanyApplicationApprovalService defines methods for company representatives on applications.
CompanyInternshipManagementService
CompanyInternshipManagementService defines CRUD operatiosn for company rep as well as visibility toggle.
CompanyRepMenu
class handles the Company Representative menu for the internship placement management system.
CompanyRepRegistrationService
CompanyRepRegistrationService defines methods for company representative registration and approval, together with listing of pending accounts.
CompanyRepresentative
 
DateUtils
This class provides methods to format dates handles date formatting and parsing, and checks if a date range is valid
FileManager
class handles the file manager for the internship placement management system.
Filter
class handles the filter for the internship placement management system.
FilterSettings
 
Internship
 
InternshipApprovalControllerStaff
stadff only class for handling internship approvals performed by career center staff.
InternshipController
Manages internship opportunities and persistence.
InternshipRegistry
Manages internship persistence and retrieval for internships handles internship submissions, lookups, and persistence
InternshipReportController
Provides reporting capabilities over internship data.
InternshipReportingService
InternshipReportingService defines methods for various reports
InternshipValidator
InternshipValidator class contains methods to validate internship creation.
InternshipViewController
Provides read-only access to internship information for the current user returns details, all internships, or student-eligible visible opportunities
SessionController
stores and clears the currently authenticated user for the CLI session.
SessionService
SessionService defines methods for session management
StaffInternshipApprovalService
StaffInternshipApprovalService defines actions for career center staff to review and decide on internship postings.
StaffMenu
class handles the Staff menu for the internship placement management system.
StaffWithdrawalApprovalService
StaffWithdrawalApprovalService defines methods for staff to moderate withdrawal requests.
Student
 
StudentApplicationService
StudentApplicationService defines student application methods: apply to internships, view own applications, and accept placement.
StudentInternshipQueryService
StudentInternshipQueryService defines read only methods for students to browse internships, view details
StudentMenu
class handles the Student menu for the internship placement management system.
StudentWithdrawalService
StudentWithdrawalService defines methods for students to request withdrawals and list their own requests.
SystemConstants
SystemConstants class contains constants max number of applications per student, max number of internships per representative, max number of slots per internship, max year of study for the basic level.
User
 
UserRegistry
Manages user persistence and retrieval for users handles user submissions, lookups, and persistence
ValidationResult
ValidationResult class contains methods to validate the result of a validation operation.
Validator
This class focues on rules for internship eligibility checks It also handles , year of study validation, major validation, and slot count validation
WithdrawalApprovalControllerStaff
Staff only class for handling withdrawal approvals
WithdrawalController
Manages withdrawal requests and persistence.
WithdrawalRegistry
Manages withdrawal request persistence and retrieval for withdrawal requests handles withdrawal request submissions, lookups, and persistence
WithdrawalReportController
Provides reporting utilities for withdrawal requests.
WithdrawalReportingService
WithdrawalReportingService defines methods for reporting withdrawal requests.
WithdrawalRequest
 
WithdrawalValidator
WithdrawalValidator class contains methods to validate withdrawal operations.
